home.inputAddressTips: Enter or paste the receiving account address
home.newPasswordLength: New password length must be greater than 8

burnMining.aboutBurnMingContent: Burn Mining is a business platform that utilizes blockchain technology for decentralized points management and allocation. By introducing merchant codes, it helps merchants increase customer retention and sales. Consumers can earn points with actual value that continuously appreciate when they spend within the merchant alliance. This model provides merchants with a low-cost, high-efficiency marketing tool and enhances consumer experience and satisfaction.
burnMining.activeMerchantCodeContent: To activate a merchant code, the merchant must first register on the D9 Merchant Alliance platform, pass the review, purchase a certain amount of points, and then generate the merchant code in the backend system. Merchants can distribute these codes to consumers through online or offline channels. When consumers use these codes, they can activate them and start enjoying point rewards.
burnMining.useMerchantCodeContent: To use a merchant code, consumers need to scan the code using the D9 Merchant Alliance app. The system will recognize and verify the code. Upon successful verification, consumers will earn points based on the purchase amount, which can be used at any merchant within the alliance for purchasing goods or services or participating in other activities.
burnMining.usePointGiftContent: To gift points, merchants purchase points through the D9 Merchant Alliance platform and then distribute them to specific consumers or groups via the backend system. Consumers are notified of the point rewards via SMS, email, or in-app notifications. After logging into their D9 Merchant Alliance account, consumers can view and claim the points, which will be directly deposited into their points account and can be used within the alliance.
burnMining.inputWalletAddress: Enter or paste the wallet address

worldSwap.inputAddAmount: Please enter the amount to add

crossBridge.reminder1: The minimum cross-chain asset amount per transaction is 20,000 USDT or more
crossBridge.reminder2: An additional 1.5% subsidy for transferring USDT from Trom to D9
crossBridge.reminder3: A 3% fee for transferring USDT from D9 to Trom
crossBridge.TrontoD9Tips1: Use the TP wallet Dapp to open the link for USDT cross-chain transfer. The minimum amount per cross-chain transfer is 20,000 or more, a 3% fee will be charged. Currently, cross-chain transfers to the D9 network are free of charge and an additional 1.5% subsidy can be obtained.
crossBridge.TrontoD9Tips2: The cross-chain process uses bidirectional random encryption misalignment block recording technology, which may extend the completion time of the cross-chain. Please be patient.

nodeVoting.inputVoteAmount: Please enter the number of votes

mySelf.name: Name
mySelf.speedTip: Block Height: The higher the value, the better the node data synchronization and stability. For nodes with similar speeds, choose the one with a higher height value for a better experience.

login.nextStep: In the next step, you will see the mnemonic phrase to restore the wallet
login.rememberTip: (12 words), please remember the following safety points!
login.assetLost: If I lose the mnemonic phrase, my assets will be lost forever!
login.assetStole: If I disclose or share my mnemonic phrase with anyone, my assets may be stolen!
login.protectWord: The responsibility to keep the mnemonic phrase secure is entirely mine!
login.writeWord: Write down the mnemonic phrase correctly using paper and pen
login.recoveryAccount: Having the mnemonic phrase is equivalent to owning the wallet assets. If your phone is lost, stolen, or damaged, the mnemonic phrase can be used to recover your account.
login.accurateSave: Keep it properly in a secure, isolated place from the network;
login.donotShare: Do not share or store the mnemonic phrase in a networked environment, such as emails, photo albums, social applications, etc.
login.tipBeforeCreate: Please remember the following safety points before creating a wallet:
login.assetControl: Assets are controlled by the private key and mnemonic phrase. Once exposed, assets can be controlled by others! Do not disclose the private key or mnemonic phrase to anyone, including us!
login.writeSaveWord: Please write down and save the mnemonic phrase correctly in a safe place. Do not transmit or store it over the network!
login.passwordSave: The wallet password is only used for the encryption and decryption of the private key and mnemonic phrase. The wallet password is stored only on the phone. If forgotten, it cannot be recovered!
login.donotScreenshot: Do not take screenshots of the private key or mnemonic phrase to avoid being intercepted by malicious software!
login.importMethod: Do not take screenshots of the import method for the private key or mnemonic phrase to avoid being intercepted by malicious software!
login.passwordLength: Password length must be greater than or equal to 8
